title: REPURPOSE Definition & Meaning - Merriam-Webster
text: repurpose verb re·pur·pose (ˌ)rē-ˈpər-pəs repurposed; repurposing; repurposes : to give a new purpose or use to repurpose the company's website repurpose the archived material Love words? Need even more definitions? Merriam-Webster unabridged
